name: HIVInfectionTestsForHIVNucleicAcidViralLoad
title: HIV Infection (Tests for HIV Nucleic Acid [Viral Load])
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of HIV nucleic acid viral load),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: HIV probe viral load),(Exclusion Criteria: Panel and donor tests)
